reasoning: This is the name of a specific system or service used in the research.
This is the basic unit of text being analyzed in the research.
This refers to specific types of elements found in essays, which are the focus of the research.

This is the main concept being evaluated in the research.
These are the characteristics of sentences being extracted for coherence analysis.
